title: North Cork. 2 br, 1 bth, 930 sqr ft, incl. gas, elec, water, parking
map_address: 3408 Rosa Parks Blvd near MLK and Rosa Parks
posting_body: 3408 Rosa Parks Blvd, Detroit, MI.
4 unit building.
Each unit is 2 br, 1 bath, 930 sqr ft.
Renting 3410 Rosa Parks Blvd Apt. 2.
$1200/month and includes gas, electric and water, gated parking.
Note availability August 15, 2022.
Security deposit is $1200.
Non-refundable cleaning fee $300
Apt will be shown by appointment only.
Times:
6 pm to 8 pm Mon-Fri, 10 am to 6 pm Sat and Sunday.
Face masks covering nose and mouth are required.
Apt is currently occupied, current tenants plan to move by end of July, 2022.
Mini-park beside building, and soccer field and walking/jogging track across the street.
Bicycle lane on street.
Stone outdoor patios and walkways.
1 min.
to I-75, 2 min to I-96 and M-10.
2 min drive to Detroit Mercy Corktown campus.
Short walking distance to three bus routes.
Elementary school across the street, Cass Tech nearby.

10 minute drive to Midtown(Wayne State University campus, Detroit Institute of Arts), Downtown(Wings, Tigers, Compuware, Renaissance Center, Campus Martius Park) and Mexicantown (Restaurants, Grocery).
Non-smoking building.
Gas stove and refrigerator in unit.
Coin washer,  dryer in basement.
Easy to clean wood looking vinyl flooring.
Unsecured 49 sqr ft. storage area in basement included in rent (i.e. bikes, air conditioners etc).
Gated parking available with additional security deposit for gate remote.
Cats and small dogs allowed with non-refundable fee.
Pets must be socialized with other people and pets or be leashed at all times.
Applications can be submitted via <URL>
Require
1)Proof of Income (can be from various sources but combined looking for 3.33x rent/month)
2)Proof of Identity
3) Criminal background check
4) Full Credit Report
5) Reference from prior landlord
6) Security Deposit required when 1)-5) is verified with signed 1 year lease (can do 18 month and 2 year lease as well)
7) Renter's liability insurance within 30 days of signing lease covering $200,000 of property damage
1)-5) can be resolved by applying via <URL>.
Will request further details if anything is missing/incomplete and will reject if not provided.
Total move in cost:
Security Deposit for remote for gated parking (optional): 40/tenant
plus Security Deposit for apartment : 1200
plus 1 month's rent: 1200
plus non-refundable cleaning fee: 300
plus Additional one time non-refundable fees for pets
